issue.title: [CF 481] Change icon numbering direction
issue.body:
I'm making a block of addons to track a lot of buffs/debuffs, and I want to sort them by duration, with the first icons showing up in the bottom left. No matter what combination of sorting low and high by shown and duration I use, I can't get icons to start appearing in the bottom left, only the top left and the bottom right. I'm guessing this is because of the way icons are numbered in groups, and I can't find a way to change that. Would it be possible to add some way to change the direction of icon numbering?


> Posted by CurseForge user pikapikatrap | Imported from CurseForge issue #481 | Raw

comments.body:
Not going to rule this out, but I can't make any promises either.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Added in r516


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
